apps.versionDescription:
## [_Translator are welcome!_](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-i-want-to-add-my-language-to-uyouplus-how-do-i-do-that)

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.39.5.
- DontEatMyContent v1.0.2: fixed the tweak not working correctly (#529).
- YouPiP v1.7.11: Added `de, it` localization.
- YTUHD v1.3.1: Added `ar, de, it, ko, ru, vi, zh_cn` localization.
- Return YouTube Dislike v1.7.1: Added `ko` localization support. 
- uYouPlus: added `du, it, hu` localization.

## Note:
- If you like the app, considering [support the developers!](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus#support-the-developers) 
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work. Fortunately, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

## Support the developers:
- [**MiRO92**](https://twitter.com/miro92): https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube#support

- [**julioverne**](https://twitter.com/ijulioverne): https://www.patreon.com/julioverne

apps.name: v17.37.3-2.1 (uYouPlus_17.37.3_2.1.ipa)

## Support the developers!
- If you like the app, considering [support the developers!](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus#support-the-developers) 

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.37.3.
- iSponsorBlock: fixed app crashes in YouTube v17.37.3.
- uYouPlus:
  - Fixed hardware VP9 not working even with TrollStore (#486).
  - The Build app Github action no longer removes app binary's entitlements when building the IPA.
  - _In case you miss it_: the issue with Google Sign-in (#420) has been solved since the previous release.

## Attention:
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

apps.name: v17.36.3-2.1 (uYouPlus_17.36.3_2.1.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## How to sign in to YouTube (Google couldn't confirm this attempt to sign in is safe. If you think this is a mistake, you can close and try again to sign in):
- Thanks to @mrbonkerz, who discovered a workaround for this problem. It's a bit complicated so I won't present the details here. Please go to the discussion and follow his guide: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/discussions/447
- If you have a better solution, don't hesitate to share it.

## Changelog:

apps.name: v17.35.3-2.1 (uYouPlus_17.35.3_2.1.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
# Note: 
- Google has just added another obstacle to prevent signing into YouTube on sideloaded version of YouTube. You'll get this warning "**Google couldn't confirm this attempt to sign in is safe. If you think this is a mistake, you can close and try again to sign in.**". Please understand that it's completely different from the previous issue (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/319).
- No **real** solution has been confirmed yet. You can discuss about the issue here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/discussions/428
- With the release of [**TrollStore**](https://github.com/opa334/TrollStore), I **highly recommend** you use [**TrollStore**](https://github.com/opa334/TrollStore) to install uYouPlus. Why?
  - Working Google Sign in.
  - Working Push notifications.
  - Working Deep link (aka Open in YouTube app).
  - YTUHD will use hardware VP9 just like the official YouTube from AppStore, which means no more stuttering, heat, battery drain...
  - Fixed error 200 when downloading media with uYou.
  - No need to refresh the app after 7 days. 
  - Completely free.

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.35.3.
- Return YouTube Dislike v1.6.7: Fixed the app crashes when opening videos (#415), thanks to @PoomSmart <3
- uYouPlus:
  - Added an option to fix Google Signin (TrollStore user only).
  - Added an option to replace the Previous & Next button with Fast foward & Rewind button.
  - Shorts: Fixed the Shorts description shows up when you tap the like button. 
  - You can now swipe right to dismiss the right panel when in full screen mode.

## Attention:
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

  - Fixed the app crashes while watching Shorts (#253).
  - Fixed the app crashes when customizing **Your channel's** avatar/banner (#125).
  - Fixed missing download Shorts buttons (#170).
  - Removed ads between Shorts (#263).
  - Fixed the mini player bar of uYou randomly show up.

- [**How to _fix_ "You can't sign in to this app because Google can't confirm that it's safe"**](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-you-cant-sign-in-to-this-app-because-google-cant-confirm-that-its-safe-warning-when-signing-in).

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.31.4.
- iSponsorBlock v1.0-15: bumped version.
- Return YouTube Dislike v1.6.6: Fixed like/dislike data not being sent to the server in recent YouTube versions.
- YTUHD v1.2.9: fixed missing 2K/4K quality (#342).
- uYouPlus:
  - Fixed missing the scroll bar in Shorts (#343).
  - Added Japan (`ja` - [Haerumastu](https://twitter.com/haerumatsu)), Spanish (`es` - #362), Simplified Chinese (`zh-cn` - #361) & update Arab (`ar` - #350) strings.

## Attention:
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

apps.name: v17.30.3-2.1 (uYouPlus_17.30.3_2.1.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Attention!
- Google has added a new implementation which prevents **new** user from sign in to modified YouTube app (see [Less secure apps](https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/6010255?hl=en)) - #319.
- Basically, If the bundle ID of the app is modified, Google won't let us sign in. This issue mainly occurs with new user, who first time sign in to uYouPlus (or any other modified YouTube app). **If you're already signed it, you will be fine**. Just don't remove the app so you don't have to sign in again. 
- With that being said, some people are not affected by this issue at all. For now, we still don't know why is it like that. There still is a workaround, but it's not available for free user. See https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/319#issuecomment-1200137309.
- I opened a discussion about the issue here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/discussions/341.

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.30.3
- uYouPlus:
  - Enable Reorder videos from playlist by @PoomSmart.
  - Added Arab (`ar` - https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/300), Czech (`cz` - #298), and Portuguese Brazilian (`pt` - #329) localization.
  - Remove **YTSystemAppearance** as it's no longer needed.
  - Fixed Hide Previous and Next Button not working (#308).
- YouPiP: Added Portuguese Brazilian localization.
  
## Attention:
- YTUHD is not working in this release! Considering it when you update the app.
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.24.4.
- YouPiP v1.7.4:
  - Added missing parentResponder property to YTPlayerPIPController (iOS 14-) in YouTube 17.23.6+
  - Added French `fr` and Chinese-TW `zh_tw` localization.
- uYouPlus:
  - Fixed app keeps crashing on iOS 16 (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/190). All credits go to @level3tjg (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/224).
  - Fix Greek localization. 
  - Added Chinese-TW localization (`zh_tw` - https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/221/), Hebrew localization (`he` - https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/215), and German localization (`de` - https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/230). [Translations are welcome!](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/blob/main/lang/uYouPlus.bundle/template.lproj/Localizable.strings)
  - Re-added the workaround for issue #54.

## Attention:
- If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3.
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).
- If PiP not working correctly as described here (issue https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97), you can try [this workaround](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97#issuecomment-1115830170).

apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.26.3.
- YouPiP v1.7.3 : 
  - Added Russian and Vietnamese localization. You can contribute translations for YouPiP [here](https://github.com/PoomSmart/YouPiP/tree/main/layout/Library/Application%20Support/YouPiP.bundle).
  - Deprecated Sample Buffer Hack since it has no effect.
  - Fixed YouPiP not working on YouTube v17.26.3.
- uYouPlus: 
  - Added Greek (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/205 ), French (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/203), Russian (https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/pull/204) and Vietnamese language. [Translations are welcome!](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/blob/main/lang/uYouPlus.bundle/temple.lproj/Localizable.strings)
  - Improved OLED Dark mode.

## Attention:
- ⚠️ **uYouPlus most likely doesn‘t work on iOS 16, so don't bother trying (#190).**
- If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3.
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).
- If PiP not working correctly as described here (issue https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97), you can try [this workaround](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97#issuecomment-1115830170).

apps.name: v17.19.3-2.1 (uYouPlus_16.42.3_2.1.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.19.3: fix home bar does not hide while playing video in full screen (#165). This is an issue of YouTube app.
- iSponsorBlock: show/hide iSponsorBlock video overlay buttons smoothly.
- Added and option to Hide Previous and Next button in video controls overlay (as requested in #164).

## Attention:
- If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3.
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).
- If PiP not woring correctly as described here (issue https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97), you can try [this workaround](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97#issuecomment-1115830170).

apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.19.2.
- Added [YTMiniplayerEnabler](https://github.com/level3tjg/YTMiniplayerEnabler/): enable the Miniplayer for all YouTube videos. You can enable it in uYouPlus's setting.
- OLED dark mode: 
  - Switching between Dark/Light theme no longer requires app restart (Enable/disable OLED Dark mode still requires app restart though).
  - Performance improved (thanks to @BandarHL <3).

## Attention:
- If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3. 
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog: - YouTube v17.18.4. - Added [NoYTPremium](https://github.com/PoomSmart/NoYTPremium/): remove YouTube Premium upshells (some how I missed this _essential_ tweak 😕 ). - YouPiP v1.7.0: - Moved all YouPiP settings into its own category (under General section). - Added "Fake YouTube version" setting (for YouTube newer than 16.46.5). - _Notes: If PiP not woring correctly as described here (issue https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97), you can try [this workaround](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/97#issuecomment-1115830170)._ - Added a new setting category for uYouPlus under General section (thanks to @BandarHL) - OLED dark mode: Fixed black text in some cases (issue #133). - Added OLED Keyboard: many thanks to @ichitaso because he handled the hardest parts <3

## Attention: - If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3. - Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads" - YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. - It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). Luckily, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work). ## Version info:

apps.name: v17.16.4-2.1 (uYouPlus_16.42.3_2.1.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.16.4
- YouPiP v1.6.11:
  - Updated to work on YouTube v17.16.4.
  - Added an option to disable PiP when mini player is actived.
- Added options to hide the Autoplay and the Subtitles button in the video controls overlay.
- Added [YTCastConfirm](https://github.com/JamieBerghmans/YTCastConfirm): prevent from casting to TV accidentally (as requested in #124).
- OLED Dark mode now only works when YouTube is in Dark theme (app restart is still required).

## Attention:
- If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3.
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality.
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). However, there are a few workarounds:
  - Safari extension: iOS 15 users can follow this workaround (Safari extension + Userscript): https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues/69
  - iOS 14: [Open in YouTube](https://shortcutsgallery.com/shortcuts/open-in-youtube/) shortcut.
  - [Opener](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/opener-open-links-in-apps/id989565871) is a paid app from AppStore that allows you to open links from the web in apps.

## Attention: - If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3. - Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads" - YTUHD is not stable atm. apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.12.5.
- YouPiP v1.6.9: minor improvement.
- iSponsorBlock v1.0-14: fixed crash in YouTube 17.11.2+.  
- Return YouTube Dislike v1.6.4: fixed rare crash.

## Attention:
- If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3.
- Workaround for missing the video's timestamp in Watch History/Playlist: Go to uYou's settings > Other Settings and [Disable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52943116/150642296-5de53fc7-a1ea-4b3d-96f4-25c9ca8b8f81.JPG) "Remove YouTube Ads"
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter suttering, heat, battery drain...
- It's impossible to fix deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App). However, there are a few workarounds:

apps.name: v17.04.3-2.1 (uYouPlus_16.42.3.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.04.3.
- Return YouTube Dislikes v1.6.2 (from v1.5.0):
  - Added an option to send your like/dislike data to [returnyoutubedislikeapi.com](http://returnyoutubedislikeapi.com/). Note that it is disabled by default. You can enable it in **YouTube Settings > General > Enable vote submission**.
  - Supports setting dislike value to server-rendered dislike button. 
  - Increments dislike value correctly once tapped on client-rendered dislike button.
  - Update dislike value on toggle for Shorts correctly.
  - Support setting dislike value for the button in the full-screen video overlay.
- iSponsorBlock v1.0-13: Fixed segment's color not appearing.
- YouPiP v1.6.6: Fixed PiP still activating on app dismiss sometimes when PiP button is enabled. 

## Attention:
- If the app crashes when opening uYou's settings, try the version based on YouTube v16.42.3.
